traits_ex

Various extensions to std.traits.

bool isGCPointer(void* ptr);
Returns:
true iff is handled by the garbage collector (GC).

template allSame(V...) if (isExpressions!V)
Returns:
true iff all values are the same. See also: http://forum.dlang.org/post/iflpslqgrixdjwrlqqvn@forum.dlang.org See also: http://forum.dlang.org/post/mheumktihihfsxxxapff@forum.dlang.org

template allSameType(T...)
Returns:
true iff all types are the same.

enum auto isHeterogeneous(T);
Returns if at least one type in the is not the same as the others.

template allSameTypesInTuple(T) if (isTuple!T)
Returns if all types in the are the same.

inout(T.Types[0])[T.length] asStaticArray(T)(inout T tup) if (allSameType!(T.Types));
Return Tuple as a Static Array. See also: http://dpaste.dzfl.pl/d0059e6e6c09

auto asDynamicArray(T)(inout T tup) if (allSameType!(T.Types));
Return Tuple as a Dynamic Array.

enum auto isIterableOf(R, E);
Useful aliases for combinations of range predicates.

enum auto isRandomAccessRangeOf(R, E);
Useful aliases for combinations of range predicates.

enum auto hasEvenLength(T...);
Check if has an even length.

enum auto isNullable(T);
Note that 
NotNull!T
is not 
isNullable
.

Examples:
static assert(isNullable!(int*));


template ElementTypeOf(alias a)
Is of type of .

Examples:
int[] var;
static assert(is(ElementTypeOf!var == int));

T

S

enum bool isPure(alias fun);
Check if is a pure function.

enum bool isPurelyCallableWith(alias fun, T...);
Check if is a function purely callable with arguments T.

auto persistentlyMemoizedCall(alias fun, T...)(T args) if (isPure!fun && isCallable!(fun, args));
Persistently Call Function with arguments .

Hash Id Build-Timestamp (Code-Id because we currently have stable way of hashing-algorithms) is Constructed from Data Structure: - Hierarchically Mangled Unqual!typeof(instance) - Use msgpack in combination with sha1Of or only sha1Of (with extended overloads for sha1Of) if available.

Extend std.functional : memoize to accept pure functions that takes an immutable mmap as input. Create wrapper that converts file to immutable mmap and performs memoization on the pure function.

pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool isNewline(C)(C c) if (isSomeChar!C);

auto enumMembers(T)();
Dynamic Variant of . See also: http://forum.dlang.org/thread/bspwlfypfishykezzocx@forum.dlang.org#post-dguqnroxbfewerepomwq:40forum.dlang.org

auto uniqueEnumMembers(T)() if (is(T == enum));
Dynamic Variant of excluding the enumerator aliases.

TODO implement with an array and a bitset indiciating if it has been found yet or not. Should have linear complexity and much less memory usage than 
uniqueEnumMembersHashed
.

See also: http://forum.dlang.org/post/ziappmtvucmuefphblse@forum.dlang.org See also: http://forum.dlang.org/post/awihyvzjswwayeqtklly@forum.dlang.org See also: http://forum.dlang.org/thread/bspwlfypfishykezzocx@forum.dlang.org#post-dguqnroxbfewerepomwq:40forum.dlang.org

auto uniqueEnumMembersHashed(T)() if (is(T == enum));
Hash-table version of 
uniqueEnumMembers
.

Examples:
enum E { x, y, z, Z = z, Y = y }
import std.algorithm.comparison : equal;
assert(uniqueEnumMembers!E.equal([E.x, E.y, E.z])); // run-time
static assert(uniqueEnumMembers!E.equal([E.x, E.y, E.z])); // compile-time
static assert(E.x == 0);
static assert(E.y == 1);
static assert(E.z == 2);
static assert(E.Z == E.z);
static assert(E.Y == E.y);
static assert(uniqueEnumMembers!E.equal(uniqueEnumMembersHashed!E));


template packedBitSizeOf(T)
Get Number of Bits Required to store an instance of . See also: http://forum.dlang.org/thread/okonqhnxzqlqtxijxsfg@forum.dlang.org

template dimensionality(T)
Get Dimensionality of Type . See also: http://forum.dlang.org/thread/hiuhqdxtpifhzwebewjh@forum.dlang.org?page=2

enum auto isTemplateInstance(T);
Returns:
true
iff 
T
is a template instance, 
false
otherwise.

Examples:
struct S(T) { T x; }
static assert(isTemplateInstance!(S!int));
static assert(!isTemplateInstance!(int));


template templateIdentifierOf(I)
Get identifier (name) string of template instance 
I
, or 
null
if 
I
is not a template instance.

template bitsNeeded(size_t length)
Get number of bits needed to represent the range (0 .. 
length
-1).

template EntropyBitsOf(T)
Get entropy in number of bits of 
T
.

Is 
true
if 
A
is an l-value, 
false
otherwise. See also: https://forum.dlang.org/post/mailman.4192.1454351296.22025.digitalmars-d-learn@puremagic.com TODO Add to Phobos

true
if 
A
is an l-value, 
false
